static $objInstance

Detailed Description

Code to diagram master class. Take to itself the service of include and require. Make code instrumentation of all the classes includes making this way possible to wacth some code execution.

Author:
Thiago Henrique Ramos da Mata <thiago.henrique.mata@gmail.com>

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

On destruct it will save the actual diagram any way

00503

00505     }

array 
00695     {
00696         $arrResult = array();
00697 
00698         if(  substr( strtolower( trim( $strLine ) ) , 0 , strlen( $strTextSearch ) ) == $strTextSearch )
00699         {
00700             $strLine = trim( $strLine );
00701             $strBefore = substr( $strLine , 0 , strlen( $strTextSearch ) );
00702             $strAfter = substr( $strLine , strlen( $strTextSearch ) );
00703             $arrWords = explode( " " , $strAfter );
00704 
00705             $strOldClassName = $arrWords[0];
00706             $strNewClassName = self::CODE_TO_DIAGRAM_CLASS_PREFIX . $strOldClassName;
00707 
00708             $arrWords[0] = $strNewClassName;
00709             $strAfter = implode( " " , $arrWords );
00710             $strLine = $strBefore . $strAfter;
00711 
00712             $arrResult[ "line" ] = $strLine;
00713             $arrResult[ "class_old" ] = $strOldClassName;
00714             $arrResult[ "class_new" ] = $strNewClassName;

isRelativePath ( $  strFile  ) 

Check if a address is relative

Assert:
( "c:\www\temp.php" ) == false
Assert:
( "d:/www/temp.php" ) == false
Assert:
( "temp.php" ) == true
Assert:
( "./temp.php" ) == true
Assert:
( "/www/something.php" ) == false
Assert:
( "./www/something.php" ) == true
Assert:
( ".\www\something.php" ) == true
Assert:
( "..\www\something.php" ) == true
Assert:
( "..\www\something.php" ) == true 
00378     {
00379         $strFile = str_replace( "\\", "/", $strFile);
00380         if(
00381             ( strpos( $strFile, "./") === 0 )
00382             or
00383             ( strpos( $strFile, "../") === 0 )
00384          )
00385         {
00386             return true;
00387         }
00388         elseif( strpos( $strFile, "/") === false )
00389         {
00390             return true;
00391         }
00392         else
00393         {
00394             return false;
00395         }
00396    }

save (  ) 

Save the actual information from the code instrumentation into the selected output.

Example:
CodeToDiagram::getInstance()->restart(); // output will be a file // CodeToDiagram::getInstance()->setOutputType( 'file' ); // name of the new file // CodeToDiagram::getInstance()->setFileName( 'myFile.html' ); # this code will be saved { $objWolf = new Wolf(); $objWolf->say( "i will be back " . date( "h:i:s") ); CodeToDiagram::getInstance()->save(); # } into the new file

Returns:
string 
00456     {
00457         $strReturn = "";
00458 
00459         if( $this->getStarted() )
00460         {
00461                 $objXmlSequence = CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->getXmlSequence();
00462 
00463             switch( $this->getOutputType() )
00464             {
00465                 case self::OUTPUT_TYPE_SCREEN:
00466                 {
00467                         $strDiagram = XmlSequencePrinterDiagram::getInstance()->perform( $objXmlSequence );
00468                     print $strDiagram;
00469                     break;
00470                 }
00471                 case self::OUTPUT_TYPE_STRING:
00472                 {
00473                         $strDiagram = XmlSequencePrinterDiagram::getInstance()->perform( $objXmlSequence );
00474                         $strReturn = $strDiagram;
00475                     break;
00476                 }
00477                 case self::OUTPUT_TYPE_FILE:
00478                 {
00479                         $strDiagram = XmlSequencePrinterDiagram::getInstance()->perform( $objXmlSequence );
00480                         file_put_contents( $this->getFileName() , $strDiagram );
00481                     break;
00482                 }
00483                 case self::OUTPUT_TYPE_XML:
00484                 {
00485                         $strReturn = XmlSequencePrinterXml::getInstance()->perform( $objXmlSequence );
00486                     break;
00487                 }
00488                 default:
00489                 {
00490                     throw new CodeToDiagramException( "Invalid output type ({$this->getOutputType()})" );
00491                     break;
00492                 }
00493             }
00494             CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->restart();
00495         }
00496         return $strReturn;
00497     }

00406     {
00407         CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->setPublicPath( $this->getPublicPath() );
00408         CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->setCallerPath( $this->getCallerPath() );

const CODE_TO_DIAGRAM_CLASS_PREFIX = "CTD"

Prefix of the code instrumentation classes of the code to diagram

const OUTPUT_TYPE_FILE = "file"

const OUTPUT_TYPE_SCREEN = "screen"

const OUTPUT_TYPE_STRING = "string"

const OUTPUT_TYPE_XML = "xml"

const REMOVE_FILES = true

If the execution happen into files the new file will be destroy just after be executed. This will prevent the existence of garbage files.

boolean

const RUN_IN_FILES = true

Should the code instrumentation run in files If not will run into a eval function

boolean
